channel.title: [Censored] Gamers Say: Opinions about Video Games
channel.description: Friends discuss their own warped opinions about video games and gaming news. Sometimes right, but often wrong.

image.title: [Censored] Gamers Say: Opinions about Video Games

channel.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast
channel.itunes:summary: Friends discuss their own warped opinions about video games and gaming news. Sometimes right, but often wrong.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Friends talk about video games and gaming news with great irreverence.

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 81: THE LUMBERYARD
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe (MadMagyar92), Peter Samyn (11samype OR samype11); Joe and Peter talk shop, the latest Playstation indie titles, the latest Nintendo handheld titles, and ET. zucchinithumbs@gmail.com
item.itunes:summary: Joe (MadMagyar92), Peter Samyn (11samype OR samype11); Joe and Peter talk shop, the latest Playstation indie titles, the latest Nintendo handheld titles, and ET. zucchinithumbs@gmail.com

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 80: GAME DEV
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe (MadMagyar92), Peter Samyn (11samype OR samype11); We've been on a gaming spree. Joe plats the Witness and Rocket League while Peter splurges on Sherlock Holmes and King's Quest. zucchinithumbs@gmail.com

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 68: NEW TOYS
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe (MadMagyar92), Peter Samyn (11samype OR samype11); Peter wars the stars. Joe outs the falls. Amiibos come and go, but friendships last forever. Speaking of which, it's been forever since a proper Mario game came out.

Peter gets a degree in alcoholism; Joe plays it safe and just murders gods insteads; Konami backpedals on its mobile nonsense; Nvidia releases a remastered version of the 980; and Square asks us all to please understand.

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 42: THE VOICE

item.itunes:summary: Joe (MadMagyar92), Peter Samyn (11samype OR samype11); Instead of lamenting the day the music died, Joe and Peter recall the day the music lived! Peter retells his horrowing tale of a life of theft and how it led him to become a master detective; Joe rises from the ground like a skyscraper; Zelda no longer exists as a game or movie; Metal Gear and Silent Hill are sinking (sunk?) ships.

item.itunes:summary: Joe (MadMagyar92) and Peter Samyn (11samype). The Wintercast! Joe muses on sending little green men to their doom in Kerbal Space Program; Peter gets into some amateur gardening in Plants Vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare; and Joe and Peter predict Nintendo's next console.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 16: NINTENDO GAMES ARE OKAY
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe (MadMagyar92), KyleHutchinson (BachNewton), Peter Samyn (11samype). The gang talks about the PlayStation experience; Joe and Peter are still reeling about Square's missteps; Joe describes competitive Halo; Peter is all aboard the PvZ Garden Wa...
item.itunes:summary: Joe (MadMagyar92), KyleHutchinson (BachNewton), Peter Samyn (11samype). The gang talks about the PlayStation experience; Joe and Peter are still reeling about Square's missteps; Joe describes competitive Halo; Peter is all aboard the PvZ Garden Warfare fun train; and Kyle plays ancient Nintendo games from the year 2002.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 15: THE SONY CONNECTION
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe (MadMagyar92), Kyle Hutchinson (BachNewton), Peter Samyn (11Samype). Joe casts sleep on Kyle and Peter while describing Final Fantasy XIII's battle system; Peter reviews Smash Bros. for seemingly the third time; Kyle recounts his Summer,
item.itunes:summary: Joe (MadMagyar92), Kyle Hutchinson (BachNewton), Peter Samyn (11Samype). Joe casts sleep on Kyle and Peter while describing Final Fantasy XIII's battle system; Peter reviews Smash Bros. for seemingly the third time; Kyle recounts his Summer, MMO days; Joe and Peter jump on the HouseMarque hypetrain.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 14: WE HAVE A DOC, WE HAVE A PLAN
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe (MadMagyar92), Kyle Hutchinson (BachNewton), Peter Samyn (11Samype). In this week's episode, Joe nails the intro and whiffs on his purchases; Peter plays LittleBigPlanet 2 for the tight platforming; and Kyle and the gang recall their backlogs.
item.itunes:summary: Joe (MadMagyar92), Kyle Hutchinson (BachNewton), Peter Samyn (11Samype). In this week's episode, Joe nails the intro and whiffs on his purchases; Peter plays LittleBigPlanet 2 for the tight platforming; and Kyle and the gang recall their backlogs.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 13: TIS THE SEASON TO BE SOCIAL
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe (MadMagyar92), Kyle Hutchinson (BachNewton), Brandon Merriman (Kerrminater/Handonium), and Peter Samyn (11Samype). On this week's episode, Joe and Kyle have a play date with Borderlands and Kerbal; Joe, Brandon, and Peter all discuss Smash Bros.
item.itunes:summary: Joe (MadMagyar92), Kyle Hutchinson (BachNewton), Brandon Merriman (Kerrminater/Handonium), and Peter Samyn (11Samype). On this week's episode, Joe and Kyle have a play date with Borderlands and Kerbal; Joe, Brandon, and Peter all discuss Smash Bros. and the ridiculous Amiibos; and Joe and Peter discuss some indie nonsense.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 12: MASSIVE CAST
item.itunes:subtitle: THE BIGGER THEY ARE, THE FASTER THEY GET OFF TRACK! In this American-sized episode, not only do we run on for 2+ hours, but we also bring on a fourth chair. Kyle Hutchinson (bachnewton) joins Joe (madmagyar92), Peter Samyn (11samype),
item.itunes:summary: THE BIGGER THEY ARE, THE FASTER THEY GET OFF TRACK! In this American-sized episode, not only do we run on for 2+ hours, but we also bring on a fourth chair. Kyle Hutchinson (bachnewton) joins Joe (madmagyar92), Peter Samyn (11samype), and Sydney Harmon (livelovedance00) in discussing a breadth of video game topics.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 11: WHERE DO WE GO NOW
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe talks about Madden to deafening silence, Peter Samyn struggles with the aging Bioshock series, Sydney Harmon swoons over Portal proposals, and then we begrudgingly talk about Amiibos... Again.
item.itunes:summary: Joe talks about Madden to deafening silence, Peter Samyn struggles with the aging Bioshock series, Sydney Harmon swoons over Portal proposals, and then we begrudgingly talk about Amiibos... Again.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 10: HOME IS WHERE THE LAUNDRY LIST IS
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe decides to never play a new game ever again, Peter Samyn has a laundry list of games to play, including Bioshock, Bayonetta, and Playstation Home, they both have a bone to pick with Sony and Nintendo,
item.itunes:summary: Joe decides to never play a new game ever again, Peter Samyn has a laundry list of games to play, including Bioshock, Bayonetta, and Playstation Home, they both have a bone to pick with Sony and Nintendo, while they consider to jump the proverbial fence into Microsoft's camp.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 9: DON’T FEED THE MACHINE
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe balances podcasting with Madden, Peter ranks all the Prince of Persia games that crashed on his PS3, Sydney won't stop talking about Minecraft, the Pokemon Alpha-Omega demo isn't a demo, and we rant about Nintendo for the ninth time!
item.itunes:summary: Joe balances podcasting with Madden, Peter ranks all the Prince of Persia games that crashed on his PS3, Sydney won't stop talking about Minecraft, the Pokemon Alpha-Omega demo isn't a demo, and we rant about Nintendo for the ninth time!
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 8: UNPROFESSIONAL PART DOS
item.itunes:subtitle: Edward joins us for but a second time! In this episode, Joe rages about a game that's been irrelevant for 5 years, Peter discusses how Smash Bros. is only worth 4.5 Elephants, Edward is excited for the next car game,
item.itunes:summary: Edward joins us for but a second time! In this episode, Joe rages about a game that's been irrelevant for 5 years, Peter discusses how Smash Bros. is only worth 4.5 Elephants, Edward is excited for the next car game, everyone agrees that the 3DS is not ergonomic, and Driveclub still doesn't work.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 7: FUBAR
item.itunes:subtitle: The show must go on, as Peter exclaims his excitement for Super Smash Bros, Joe raves about his new found conversion to the mobile platform, and Sydney stays eerily silent, watching, waiting, commiserating.
item.itunes:summary: The show must go on, as Peter exclaims his excitement for Super Smash Bros, Joe raves about his new found conversion to the mobile platform, and Sydney stays eerily silent, watching, waiting, commiserating.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 6: WHO’S IN SMASH BROS?
item.itunes:subtitle: Peter takes Joe's place as host this week. Edward, a guest to the show, tells us about Battlefield and new changes to the game. Peter talks up Smash Bros. on 3DS and Edward guesses the roster. Finally, Sydney takes over the news section. Also,
item.itunes:summary: Peter takes Joe's place as host this week. Edward, a guest to the show, tells us about Battlefield and new changes to the game. Peter talks up Smash Bros. on 3DS and Edward guesses the roster. Finally, Sydney takes over the news section. Also, Disney Princesses.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 5: THE UNPROFESSIONAL CAST
item.itunes:subtitle: Peter convinces Joe to download the Smash Bros. demo, Joe shares horroring stories to Sydney about his Minecraft escapades, Sydney plays a game, I guess, news is also shared, I dunno, and a discussion is had about framerate and how it's we all largely ...
item.itunes:summary: Peter convinces Joe to download the Smash Bros. demo, Joe shares horroring stories to Sydney about his Minecraft escapades, Sydney plays a game, I guess, news is also shared, I dunno, and a discussion is had about framerate and how it's we all largely agree on everything, sorta. I don't know how this got uploaded.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 4: I MIGHT BE A WEABOO
item.itunes:subtitle: What has happened? Why can't I swear? My ears are bleeding! Also, Peter discusses his return to the lusty Soul Calibur Lost Swords, Joe takes another trip down nostalgia lane with Theatrhythm Curtain Call and Final Fantasy Tactics: War of the Lions,
item.itunes:summary: What has happened? Why can't I swear? My ears are bleeding! Also, Peter discusses his return to the lusty Soul Calibur Lost Swords, Joe takes another trip down nostalgia lane with Theatrhythm Curtain Call and Final Fantasy Tactics: War of the Lions, Sydney expresses disappointment with the Microsoft acquisition of Mojang, and everyone realizes what a weirdo Joe is.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 3: MAYBE IF THEY ALL HAD AFROS
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe , Peter Samyn, and guest Brandon Merriman discuss the PlayStation's good (Final Fantasy Tactics), bad (Rock of the Dead), and ugly (God of War Collection Vita) games, share professional Smash Bros.
item.itunes:summary: Joe , Peter Samyn, and guest Brandon Merriman discuss the PlayStation's good (Final Fantasy Tactics), bad (Rock of the Dead), and ugly (God of War Collection Vita) games, share professional Smash Bros. strategems, appreciate beautiful and hard PS4 games, and ponder what a Microsoft acquisition of Mojang would entail.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 2: AMIIBO BASICALLY DO NOTHING
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe, Sydney Harmon, and Peter Samyn fail to digest the sham that is NTSC's Disney Singstar, have a therapy session over Peter's apathy towards Minecraft, discuss why "normal" won't cut it with druggies,
item.itunes:summary: Joe, Sydney Harmon, and Peter Samyn fail to digest the sham that is NTSC's Disney Singstar, have a therapy session over Peter's apathy towards Minecraft, discuss why "normal" won't cut it with druggies, rail on Nintendo some more, make questionable consumer decisions, and determine that no one wants to send us emails.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 1: NINTENDENIAL
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe, Sydney Harmon, and Peter Samyn talk about the terrible God of War Collection Vita port, discuss Dark Souls without actually discussing Dark Souls by discussing Dark Souls anyway,
item.itunes:summary: Joe, Sydney Harmon, and Peter Samyn talk about the terrible God of War Collection Vita port, discuss Dark Souls without actually discussing Dark Souls by discussing Dark Souls anyway, chronicle the perfectly coherent Kingdom Hearts narrative, pick beefs with Nintendo, and unanimously agree that Final Fantasy Tactics is the greatest game of all time.
item.itunes:author: Zucchini Thumbs Cast
